title: 10: S6E10 – "Unsuspected Evils" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four terrifying tales from authors Elias Witherow, Sam Marduk, Emerry, and Andrew Harmon, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about weird weather, Antarctic anomalies, untimely ends, and haunted hotels. 

                                  
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
